long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stickman Dragon Fight for Chrome Extension is an exciting online game that can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.

Stickman Dragon Fight is an action-packed fighting game where players take on the role of powerful heroes battling against evil forces. The game features fast-paced combat, requiring players to move swiftly, dodge and block enemy attacks, power up their ki, and utilize advanced attack skills unique to each hero.

The game offers three modes of play:

Story Mode: Embark on an epic journey, fighting enemies and uncovering the truth about the world.
Versus Mode: Team up with two other heroes to face off against another team in thrilling battles.
Tournament Mode: Compete with 15 other teams in a tournament to claim ultimate victory.

Stickman Dragon Fight can be played for free at the website https://classroom-6x.org/.
